name: FuluBeatVR
description:
"Shake your head along to the beat in VR space!
Here comes the next-generation musical game in Virtual Space!
Let’s enjoy the freshest music game!!

◆Music Game × VR
Nod your head along to the groove in outer space with beautiful floating objects!

◆Simple × Refreshing
Easy to play - Just move your head along with the music.
You don’t need to go crazy - small head motions can be detected.
Combo the beats and experience the exhilarating feeling of being on a roller coaster!

◆Various levels
There are 4 difficulty levels - Easy, Normal, Hard, and Super.
Master all levels and get 3 stars!

***【About the VR Cardboard】***
VR headset for smartphone such as Hacosco or Google Cardboard is needed to play this game.
※ “Hacosco” is a product of Hacosco Inc.
※ Google Cardboard is a product of Google.


***【Price】***
Free

***【Compatible Devices and OS】***
iPhone5s or later / iOS 8.0 or higher

*** About the Startup screen ***
If the startup screen with cardboard tutorial doesn’t disappear, unlock the Portrait Orientation Mode of your iPhone and rotate the device once or twice.
"
